price: To! Haƙĩƙa Allah Ya mallaki abin da yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa. To! Haƙĩƙa wa'adin Allah gaskiya ne. Amma kuma mafi yawansu ba su sani ba.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alā inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alā inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
